instructions: Answer the following questions to the best of your ability. This test will help determine your current skill level for Software Architecture.

questions.question: What is software architecture and how is it different from software design?
Explain the concept of layered architecture and give an example.
What is the difference between monolithic and microservices architecture?
What are functional and non-functional requirements in software systems?
Explain the importance of scalability and how it can be achieved in a system.
How would you approach designing a system that can handle high availability?
Explain event-driven architecture and when it is most useful.
What are some strategies for migrating from a monolithic system to microservices?
Describe how you would evaluate and choose between multiple architectural options for a large enterprise system.
